text: The approach to highlighting the female form in fashion is ever-changing. Sometimes it's about the decolletage, followed by a moment that's all derriere, and there's always the option of the full-on naked dress. This summer, the sensual body part to display is no doubt the leg. Thigh-high slits on skirts and dresses have been showcasing well-toned stems since May. See some well-heeled ladies give their best Angelina Jolie.
